rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 12 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 7:20 AM, 09 July 2025(Wednesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Cavite, Metro Manila, Batangas, Pampanga and Bulacan within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Bataan(Morong) and Zambales(Olongapo, Subic, San Antonio) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
